``` {r}

load(here("jk_code", "JK_clean_MD.rds"))

SO <- SO4

rm(SO4)

```

```{r}

DimPlot(SO,group.by = "subclass2_MD")



Idents(SO) <- SO$subclass2_MD

SO2 <- subset(SO, idents = c("type_2"), invert = TRUE)


DimPlot(SO2)

SO2 <- SCTransform(SO2) %>%
    RunPCA() %>%
    FindNeighbors(dims = 1:15) %>%
    FindClusters(resolution = 0.7) %>%
    RunUMAP(dims = 1:15)

DimPlot(SO2)


```
```{r}

all_markers <- FindAllMarkers(SO2, only.pos = TRUE, min.pct = 0.5, logfc.threshold = 0.5)

all_markers %>%
    group_by(cluster) %>%
    dplyr::filter(avg_log2FC > 1, p_val_adj < 0.05) %>%
    slice_head(n = 5) %>%
    ungroup() -> top3

DoHeatmap(SO2, features = top3$gene) + NoLegend()

```
